reason: Bitcoin is showing significant underlying strength, rising despite regulatory uncertainty. The inherent volatility of the crypto market, coupled with persistent regulatory ambiguity (even if 'shrugged off' for now), warrants a higher risk score. We are in an expansionary (Markup) phase for Bitcoin itself, but caution is advised on broader market positions due to altcoin underperformance.
